==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}
{{wikipedia|Chinese ghosts}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – a man or figure with an ugly face and tail.

Compare {{zh-l|*異|different, strange}}, where the {{zh-l|*田}} also derives from a face.

It may not be clear from the character, but the lower right “dot” is a small {{zh-l|*厶}}; it is a residual tail – compare {{zh-l|*离}}.

Graphically, modern form is {{Han compound|甶|儿|厶}}.

===Etymology===
{{unk.|lang=zh}}. May be related to {{och-l|威|to overawe, to terrorise}} with ''k''-nominalisation and endoactive tone B, ''lit.'' "the thing which is doing the overawing", or related to {{och-l|歸|to return}}. See also {{och-l|詭|to deceive; peculiar}}.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[ghost]], especially that of a deceased who has returned to haunt the living; [[devil]]; [[apparition]]
#: {{zh-x|這 房子 常常 鬧鬼。|This house is haunted.}}
# [[goblin]]; [[demon]]; [[spirit]]
# [[stealthy]]; [[tricky]]; [[furtive]]
# a [[sinister]] [[plot]]; a [[dirty]] [[trick]]
#: {{zh-x|心裡 有 鬼|to harbour intentions that can't bear daylight}}
# [[devilish]]; [[damned]]; [[ghastly]]
#: {{zh-x|鬼 天氣|'''damned''' weather}}
# {{lb|zh|informal}} [[clever]]; [[smart]]; [[quick]]
#: {{zh-x|這 孩子 鬼 得{de}很！|This kid is amazingly '''smart'''!}}
# {{lb|zh|derogatory}} [[fool]]; [[blockhead]]; [[guy]]
#: {{zh-x|那個 老鬼 又 來 了。|That gaffer is coming again.}}
# {{n-g|Derogatory name for people with a flaw or vice.}}
#: {{zh-x|煙鬼|heavy smoker}}
#: {{zh-x|酒鬼|alcoholic}}
#: {{zh-x|懶鬼|lazybones}}
# {{lb|zh|intimate}} [[imp]]; [[urchin]]
#: {{zh-x|小鬼|imp}}
#: {{zh-x|機靈鬼|crafty child}}
# {{lb|zh|regional|usually in compounds}} a [[Caucasian]] or [[Western]] [[person]]
#: {{zh-x|鬼佬|gweilo ''(derogatory term for a white person)''|C}}
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese|inserted in certain adjectives}} [[so]]; [[very]]
# {{lb|zh|vulgar}} {{non-gloss definition|an intensifier}}
#: {{zh-x|什麼 鬼 233|what the hell LOL}}
#: {{zh-x|我 點 鬼 記得！|How '''the hell''' am I supposed to remember?!|C}}
#: {{zh-x|有 鬼 人 知 咩！|Who ['''the fuck'''] knows!|C}}
#: {{zh-x|鬼 叫 你……|Who '''the hell''' told you to...|C}}

<div style="float:right;">
[[File:Oni2WP.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|鬼}} (''oni''): two '''[[demon]]-[[ogre]]s'''.]]

{{ja-kanjitab|おに|yomi=k}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おに}}

# [[ghost]]

#* {{RQ:Wamyō Ruijushō|1|32}}<ref>{{R:Wamyō Ruijushō}}</ref>
#*: 人神 周易云、人神曰鬼、居偉反、和名'''於邇'''、或説云、'''於邇'''者、隠音之訛也、鬼物隠而不欲顯形、故以稱也。
